name: Revengine
body:
### Welcome to RevEngine.
Rev engine is a open source game engine built in visual studio, using OpenGL, FreeGLUT and OpenAL. I'm not very far yet, but I promise, more will come!

![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/x91vgSu.png)


### Licensing
RevEngine is licensed under the Apache License V2.0. here is a short summary of what you can and cannot do with RevEngine.


####You can:

Use this RevEngine for commercial purposes

Modify this software and create derivatives

Distribute the original or modified version of RevEngine

Grant a license to it, or extend it

Modify RevEngine for private use without distribution

Use patent claims

Place warranty on RevEngine


####You can not:

Hold the software/license owner liable for any damage done.

Use RevEngine's logo without my permission


####You must:

Include copyright

Include the full license

State changes made to RevEngine


#####make sure to read the fule license [Here.](https://github.com/NaamloosDT/RevEngine/blob/master/LICENSE)

![](http://i.imgur.com/IZGS71V.png)
